title: Demon's Odyssey - Sinful Pride
description: Pride, rumored to be the strongest of the Seven Deadly Sins Generals, has fallen. The balance of power between the races has been broken. The Lerien continent has been engulfed once again into the vicious flames of war, and the Demon Lord was forced into a losing battle. 200 years later, in a small village, Pride has been reborn as a human boy. With his soul cleansed and mind unhindered, he plans to use this second chance to atone for his sins and become someone he can be proud of.
author: Antonis Kamenakis
